author: guitarskills2

text: Such a strange game: an amalgam of mechanics (fighting + adventure) and contributors: Seiichi Ishii of Virtua Fighter/Tekken fame, Akira Toriyama of Dragon Ball/Dragon Quest/Chrono Trigger game and a plethora of awesome composers. This particular track was made by Shimomura, which I honestly wouldn't have guessed! The bass is especially solid. Oh, and I'll always remember the excitement of playing that FF7 demo.
author: SupraDarky

text: The next upload should kick-off my Top 10 2015 GOTY list.
author: SupraDarky

text: +SupraDarky Talking about Shimomura, I'm super hyped for FFXV's OST. I haven't heard her outside of a Kingdom Hearts context for a long time, and I can't wait to see what she pulls out in FFXV. Awesome track by the way! Bustin' it up at the beach is a bit similar.
author: Taislinmaosdela

text: +Taislinmaosdela Did not know Shimomura is doing XV. Good news!
